message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to offer you the product for $1100000. This is a fair price considering its value to you is $800000, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $800000.

I understand that you're looking to get a good deal, Bob. However, $900000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our initial offer and your counteroffer. I'll make a new offer of $1000000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to me is $1200000, and I'm willing to compromise to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Considering we're getting close to the end of our negotiation, I'll make one final offer. I'll sell the product to you for $1050000. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
